message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is priced at $1,300,000. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, but I assure you that investing in this solution will provide substantial returns on your investment. Please consider this offer carefully, and let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.
